argumentText:
ARGUMENT
k n

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dgradd.1 | |- M = ( deg ` F ) |
| 2 |  | dgradd.2 | |- N = ( deg ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( coeff ` F ) = ( coeff ` F ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( coeff ` G ) = ( coeff ` G ) |
| 5 | 3, 4, 1, 2 | #P_coemullem | |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> ( ( coeff ` ( F oF x. G ) ) = ( n e. NN0 |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... n ) ( ( ( coeff ` F ) ` k ) x. ( ( coeff ` G ) ` ( n - k ) ) ) ) /\ ( deg ` ( F oF x. G ) ) <_ ( M + N ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> ( deg ` ( F oF x. G ) ) <_ ( M + N ) ) |
